content: **crocheted barbeque mitten in 2 strands drops paris theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-859 yarn group c + c or e ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l measurements circumference approx 26-28-31 cm length approx 28-30-32 cm **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100-100 g colour 37 bordeaux 100-100-100 g colour 66 plum crochet hook drops crochet hook size 5 5 mm **crochet gauge ** 13 double crochets in width and 14 row vertically with 2 strands = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
